section.title:
work orders history by item
items work order history for Work Order History by Item
section.para: To view Work Order History by Item, select the "Work Order History by Item" option. The following screen will appear:

note.para: Work Order Materials and Operations history is saved in the database after a Work Order is closed. Reports can be written to retrieve this information.

section.para: When displaying Work Order History by Item, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the Item Number of the Item whose Work Order History you want to view.
Select to display the Work Order History by Item for all Warehouses.
Specify Warehouse whose Work Order History by Item you want to display.
Work Orders scheduled on and after this date will be displayed.
Work Orders scheduled on and before this date will be displayed.

varlistentry.term: Only Show Top Level Work Orders

listitem.para: Select to display only top level Work Orders.
Top level Work Orders are Work Orders that have not been created to meet the component demands of a parent Work Order.
Select to display Work Order Costs in the "Work Orders" display.
Display lists Work Order History by Item, using the specified parameters.

The start dates and end dates are color-coded for ease of use. Both dates will display in red type if the Work Order is not yet in-process and is also past due. Once a Work Order's Status is changed to in-process ("I"), the start date will automatically revert to black type.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Select to generate the display, using the specified parameters.
Runs the report associated with this screen.

section.para: Right-clicking on a Work Order in the Work Orders list enables you to select from the following menu options:
